localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Stage is a browser-based editor for creating app wireframes. Visualize your ideas in minutes with ready-made blocks. Use a library of mobile patterns to kickstart ideation process. Share your project and export it to a design tool with a single click.
nodes.title: Stage - The all-new online wireframing app
nodes.author: Yura Yasyuk

nodes.excerpt: Does your SaaS product have multiple users per account, or multiple accounts per user? Unlike other email automation tools, Userlist now supports companies, and allows you to onboard and engage teams in a smart way.
nodes.title: Company Accounts by Userlist - Email the right user at the right time
nodes.author: Charlie Irish

nodes.excerpt: Ever thought your browser theme was boring, bland, and just getting old? Add some color your daily browsing experience with a new custom theme for Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge! You can customize and control every single feature of your theme. Make it yours!
nodes.title: Chrome Theme Studio - Easily create a theme for most Chromium-based browsers
nodes.author: Jamsheed Mistri

nodes.excerpt: A large collection of ready to used library to design and prototype your ideas, faster. More than 250+ building blocks with 150+ screen template. Available for Figma, Sketch, XD
nodes.title: Bloo Lo-fi Wireframe Kit - Open source wireframe kit for design and prototyping
nodes.author: vijay verma

nodes.excerpt: Create your blog. Make it beautiful. Make it yours. Your personal space to tell your story, share your photos, or record what you love about life. Other 1MB members can follow your blog and like your blog posts. Your blog hosted on 1MB's fast & secure network.
nodes.title: Blogging by 1MB - The easy way to host your website or blog
nodes.author: Dalton Edwards

nodes.excerpt: Wormhole lets you share files with end-to-end encryption and a link that automatically expires.
nodes.title: Wormhole - Simple, private file sharing
nodes.author: Feross Aboukhadijeh

nodes.excerpt: This file includes a bunch of experiments with interactive components in Figma to create some motion in your design. You can download Figma Beta to use interactive components.
nodes.title: Motion - Interactive components in Figma to create motion
nodes.author: Pavan Kusuma

nodes.excerpt: Prime 3.0 is the set of 7 Libraries for Sketch. It helps design UI much faster thanks to over 2,000 Components and 140 UI Templates (Web + Mobile) connected with 600+ Styles and Color Variables. Configure Prime within minutes and use Components within seconds.
nodes.title: Prime Design Starter Kit 3.0 - Set of 7 UI kits to kick-off your project
nodes.author: Thalion

nodes.excerpt: Queentessence empowers physical venues, to understand their customersâ€”just as online businesses do. Our platform enables you to gather & analyze data through wireless hotspots, so you can predict demand, send special offers & conduct email marketing campaigns.
nodes.title: Queentessence - Digital marketing platform for physical venues
nodes.author: Yuval Elkeslasi

nodes.excerpt: Install Netflip on your partner's device to find movies you BOTH like. Swipe right to LIKE! If your partner likes the same movie you HAVE to watch your match. Select your streaming services to make sure you can watch your matched movie or TV show.
nodes.title: Netflip - Tinder for movies: swipe through Netflix, Prime or Disney+
nodes.author: Betty St

nodes.excerpt: We're excited to present a nice update of Bobby, the iPhone app that helps you keep track of your subscriptions. One of the often requested feature has now been added; Categories! You can now group subscriptions to categories in Bobby like Personal and Work.
nodes.title: Bobby 3.5 - Keep track of your subscriptions, now with categories
nodes.author: Vince Schwidder

nodes.excerpt: Inspirational Tests is a free compilation of different A/B Tests conducted on the copy, CTA/Pricing page, and UX/Design of different landing pages.
nodes.title: Inspirational A/B Tests - 30+ inspiring A/B test results and takeaways
nodes.author: Emir AtlÄ±

nodes.excerpt: Collect and understand user insights with UserLeapâ€™s in-product microsurveys! Access 75+ free microsurvey templates, each designed by our User Research team, and grouped into use cases so you can get answers to your most important product questions, fast.
nodes.title: Microsurvey Template Gallery by UserLeap - Get continuous insights with 75+ free microsurvey templates.
nodes.author: Julie Chabin

nodes.excerpt: Firework brings the TikTok/IG/Snap Story experience into any Website or any app. Raised $55M in Series A, we aim to unite the open internet (decentralized and open) to fight against the giant social media (centralized and closed)
nodes.title: Firework Web Story Platform - B2B Version of TikTok
nodes.author: Vincent Yang

nodes.excerpt: The Collections database consists of entries for more than 480,000 works in the MusÃ©e du Louvre and MusÃ©e National EugÃ¨ne-Delacroix. Updated on a daily basis, it is the result of the continuous research and documentation efforts carried out by both museums.
nodes.title: Louvre Museum Online - Explore the entirety of the Louvre's collection for free

nodes.excerpt: A minimalist Flutter framework inspired from TailwindCSS and SwiftUI for rapidly building custom designs.
nodes.title: VelocityX - A minimalist Flutter framework
nodes.author: Mayur Sojitra

nodes.excerpt: Bring your projects up to a whole new level using Artify's illustrations plugin, now available directly inside Figma. Through this new plugin you can search & import over 5000 illustrations with over 70 different design styles directly in your figma projects.
nodes.title: 5000+ illustrations for Figma by Artify - Figma plugin with 5000 illustrations in 70+ design styles
nodes.author: Juan Sarmiento

nodes.excerpt: The pack you've been looking for to bring your website or app to the next level. This pack contain 100 animated icons, rendered in svg, ready to be integrated to your website. The pack will be regularily updated with new versions of the icons to fit all your needs.
nodes.title: Iconimations - Svg animated icons pack, ready to be integrated to your site
nodes.author: Adrian Campagnolle

nodes.excerpt: Accelerate your development & build fully customizable video-based applications with the performance, scale, and reliability of Zoom's industry leading video-first communications platform. â € Get started at no charge with 10,000 session minutes per month.
nodes.title: Video SDK from Zoom - Build fully customizable video-based apps
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: This interactive guide will be the first step in helping you get started with analytics. It contains ğŸ§  the basic concepts and ğŸ“š terminology you need to track your startupâ€™s growth user engagement. ğŸ‘‰ Give it a try: http://guide.june.so/
nodes.title: Startup Guide to Analytics - The simple guide to get started with analytics
nodes.author: Enzo Avigo

nodes.excerpt: The Self Stack is everything you need to build a transparent, user obsessed digital studio. No Google. No Facebook. No trust violations. This is agency creativity without sacrificing your soul.
nodes.title: Self Stack - A curated directory of privacy first agency tools
nodes.author: Joan Westenberg

nodes.excerpt: The UI Coach anonymous feedback platform allows UI/UX designers to post their work and receive feedback and critiques from other designers from all around the world. UI Coach helps you create better designs and grow your skills by allowing you to get the feedback you need when you need it most.
nodes.title: UI Feedback - Free anonymous feedback  for UI/UX designers
nodes.author: Jim Raptis

nodes.excerpt: With Palette you can add colors to your palette and click to copy the HEX when you need a color.
nodes.title: Palette - Store and share colors between apps
nodes.author: Dave

nodes.excerpt: Uranus - Wireframe Kit is a Premium wireframing pack with more than 140+ dark/light ready-to-use web elements/sections. The basement idea of this kit was started from the wireframing time problem! ğŸ”¥ Will be available in Sketch, Adobe Xd & Code format soon.
nodes.title: Uranus v1.2 - Wireframe kit with 140+ modern UI web sections for Figma
